message_1: What is the coordination number and geometry of the complex formed between Cu2+ and ethylenediamine (en)?
message_2: The coordination number of the complex formed between Cu2+ and ethylenediamine (en) is 4. The geometry of this complex is square planar. In this complex, two ethylenediamine molecules act as bidentate ligands, each donating two nitrogen atoms to coordinate with the Cu2+ ion.
